segments.text: I'll have a whole-wheat loaf , three white loaves , a baguette and ten rolls , please . How much is that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The whole-wheat loaf is 45 cents , the white loaves are 35 cents each , the baguette is 27 cents and the rolls are eight cents each . That makes two dollars fifty-seven cents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , ma'am . Forty-three cents change . Have a nice day .
segments.speaker: S2
